revised_title: A New Approach to the Heisenberg Uncertainty Principle
tldr: This article presents a geometrical approach to the Heisenberg uncertainty relation and its generalization. The author derives inequalities involving the dispersion and expectations of operators and their commutators, providing a stronger version of the Heisenberg inequality. The results are applicable to any vector in Hilbert space and three self-adjoint linear operators.
